room_title: Escape room "Lenny Thompkins Sold His Soul to Play the Blues" by Pursue the Clues in Hartford
room_description: From a young age, all Lenny Thompkins ever wanted was to play the blues. After years of honing his skills, he decided to do the one thing that would give him a better sound than anyone. Lenny Thompkins made a deal with a mysterious woman named Lucy, and that deal didn't do him much good. Find the contract, save Lenny's soul, and let him play the blues in peace.
